name: Flappy-Bird (InventorX)
description:
creator:-Shakti Pathak

This is the replica of the Original Flappy Bird Game made with pygame module in python with an all-new look and feel. Make Your new Highscore and enjoy playing this addictive game. Do not forget to give your kind feedback.

Controls:-

SPACE-To Fly, ESC:-To exit the game, ENTER:-To restart the game.
